ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure what level you are but gate is not good for safety unless you are low level or you are high level fighting greens.    When you get to the mid 20 s
ygData.messageBody:
I"m not sure what level you are but gate is not good for safety unless you
are low level or you are high level fighting greens. When you get to
the mid 20's and start fighting stuff that hits you for mega damage gate
will not work. Divine is the way to go. Now a divine and then gate
when the divine wears off will work..(that is if you are grouped) most
mosnters will move off you when you divine..

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, Jeff wrote:

> From: "Jeff" <jeffh@...>
>
> > Wow, no divine aura - brave guy.
> >
>
> Its not so much the, lack of divine aura that I find brave. Its the fact
> that there is also no gate. Only one is needed to get you out of trouble.
>
